about_the_game: New for Spring 2007, Red Orchestra: Ostfront 41-45 is updated with a wealth of new features: 10 new community-made maps; support for 50+ player battles; new content, including the Russian BT-7 light tank with infantry tank riders and the first player controllable anti-tank gun in the game; updated artwork and music; several features requested by the clan/ladder/league community to enhance competitive play; and a heap of other enhancements.
